categories.name: Social Contact
categories.description: Behaviors that involve direct physical interaction between animals.

categories.name: Approach / Withdrawal
categories.description: Transitions that change proximity to the social partner.

categories.name: Vertical Exploration
categories.description: Exploratory or investigative behaviors directed away from the partner.

modifiers.name: Focal Initiated
modifiers.description: The focal (annotated) subject initiated the action.

modifiers.name: Partner Initiated
modifiers.description: The stimulus or partner animal initiated the action.

modifiers.name: Sustained
modifiers.description: Behavior lasted longer than the typical duration (mark when >3s).

behaviors.name: Approach
behaviors.description: Focal animal moves toward the stimulus partner.

behaviors.name: Withdrawal
behaviors.description: Focal animal increases distance from the stimulus partner.

behaviors.name: Sniffing Excretions
behaviors.description: Focal mouse sniffs excretions of the stimulus mouse.

behaviors.name: Stimulus Sniffs Focal
behaviors.description: Stimulus mouse investigates the focal mouse.

behaviors.name: Nose-to-Nose Sniffing
behaviors.description: Focal mouse engages in nose-to-nose sniffing.

behaviors.name: Nose-to-Flank Sniffing
behaviors.description: Focal mouse sniffs the flank of the stimulus partner.

behaviors.name: Nose-to-Anogenital Sniffing
behaviors.description: Focal mouse sniffs the anogenital region of the partner.

behaviors.name: Rearing
behaviors.description: Focal mouse rears up; vertical exploration event.
